@@ -86,4 +86,6 @@ - *

If this method is invoked after all shutdown hooks have already - * been run and the status is nonzero then this method halts the - * virtual machine with the given status code. Otherwise, this method - * blocks indefinitely. + *

Shutdown is serialized such that only one invocation will run + * shutdown hooks and terminate the VM with the given status code. That + * invocation may be initiated via platform specific signal handlers. All + * other invocations will block indefinitely, and their supplied exit + * statuses will be ignored. If this method is invoked from a shutdown hook + * the system will deadlock.
